data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Gamba's Yuya Fukuda is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 3, Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Gamba throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 5, Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 8, Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
Kosuke Onose of Gamba gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Free kick for Gamba in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
In the minute 13, Gamba have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Throw-in for Gamba close to the penalty box.
Gamba are whistled for offside.
In the minute 13, Yokohama Marinos advance rapidly upfield but Nobutsugu Murakami blows for offside.
Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gamba drive upfield and Shu Kurata gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Yokohama Marinos defender.
In the minute 14, Junior Santos for Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Suita.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 15, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Gamba.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos's Junior Santos gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 17, Gamba have a goal kick.
Marcos Junior (Yokohama Marinos) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Gamba defenders.
Yokohama Marinos's Junior Santos gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gamba defender.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 25, Gamba's Takashi Usami misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
In the minute 25, In Suita Gamba attack through Yosuke Ideguchi. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
Throw-in for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 26, It's now 0-1 thanks to an own goal from Kim Young-Gwon.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos are pushing forward but Junior Santos's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 30, Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 33, Gamba are caught offside.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 34, Nobutsugu Murakami awards the home team a throw-in.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Gamba's half.
Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 39, Yokohama Marinos have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama Marinos in Suita.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
In the minute 41, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gamba's Yuki Yamamoto breaks free at Panasonic Stadium Suita. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Free kick Yokohama Marinos.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Penalty! Nobutsugu Murakami points to the spot, great chance for Gamba...
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 45, Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
Takashi Usami scores from the spot and Gamba draw level at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
The second-half is underway at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Gamba.
Kosuke Onose (Gamba) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
In the minute 50, Can Gamba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama Marinos's half?
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a throw-in for Gamba, close to Yokohama Marinos's area.
Patric (Gamba) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 51, Nobutsugu Murakami awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
Gamba are coming forward and Yosuke Ideguchi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Gamba just outside Yokohama Marinos's area.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 56, Theerathon Bunmathan (Yokohama Marinos) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Gamba have a goal kick.
In the minute 58, At Panasonic Stadium Suita, Yokohama Marinos are penalized for being offside.
In Suita, Yuki Yamamoto of Gamba is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Erik of Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 60, Nobutsugu Murakami awards Gamba a goal kick.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Suita to check on Gen Shoji, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 63, Gamba's Gen Shoji looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
In Suita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 66, Gamba have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
In the minute 68, Yosuke Ideguchi of Gamba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Gamba's half.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 70, Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gamba's Yuki Yamamoto breaks free at Panasonic Stadium Suita. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
In the minute 72, Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
In the minute 73, Gamba needs to be cautious. Yokohama Marinos have an attacking throw-in.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Gamba have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
Gamba make their first substitution with Kazuma Watanabe replacing Patric.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
In the minute 78, Daizen Maeda is replacing Junior Santos for the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
In the minute 80, Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Suita.
In the minute 85, The home team replace Shu Kurata with Shinya Yajima.
Tsuneyasu Miyamoto (Gamba) is making a third substitution, with Ademilson replacing Takashi Usami.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Free kick for Gamba in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Can Gamba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama Marinos's half?
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Gamba.
Yuki Yamamoto for Gamba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 89, Nobutsugu Murakami awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
At Panasonic Stadium Suita the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Gamba throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
